title: StarCraft 2 - How Quickly Can SCARLETT Dispose Of Noobs? (Part 1) | Holdout Challenge
excerpt: We paid Scarlett to 1v1 noobs. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match as long as possible. Scarlett unleashed her cheesy plays to stop the clock.
